de.adorsys.opba.consent.rest.api.resource

Interface ConsentAuthorisationApi


  • public interface ConsentAuthorisationApi
    tags = "Authorization Entry Point", description = "Provides access to ConsentAPI"
    Author:
    fpo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> authEntryPoint(String redirectCode) 
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> denyRedirect(String consentAuthSessionCookie, DenyRedirectRequest request)
      Provides the ConsentAuthorisationApi with the opportunity to close this ConsentSession and redirect the PSU back to the TPP OR close the application window.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> embeddedAuth(String consentAuthSessionCookie, PsuAuthRequest request)
      Update consent session with PSU auth data whereby requesting remaining challenges for the ongoing authorization process.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> fromAspspNok(String consentSessionState, String consentAuthSessionCookie)
      Redirecting back from ASPSP to TPP after a failed consent authorization.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> fromAspspOk(String consentSessionState, String consentAuthSessionCookie)
      Redirecting back from ASPSP to ConsentAuthorisationApi after a successful consent authorization.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> grantRedirect(String consentAuthSessionCookie, AuthorizeRequest request)
      Provides the ConsentAuthorisationApi with the opportunity to redirect the PSU to the ASPSP.

    • Method Detail

      • authEntryPoint

        @GetMapping(path="/auth",
            params="redirectCode")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> authEntryPoint(@RequestParam(name="redirectCode")
                                                                                                                                       String redirectCode)

      • grantRedirect

        @PostMapping(path="/to/aspsp/grant")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> grantRedirect(@RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                 String consentAuthSessionCookie,
                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                 AuthorizeRequest request)
        Provides the ConsentAuthorisationApi with the opportunity to redirect the PSU to the ASPSP.
        Parameters:
        AuthorizeRequest - containing the consentSessionState
        consentAuthSessionCookie - The ConsentAuthSessionCookie
        Returns:
        Void

      • denyRedirect

        @PostMapping(path="/to/aspsp/deny")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> denyRedirect(@RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                               String consentAuthSessionCookie,
                                                                                               @RequestBody
                                                                                               DenyRedirectRequest request)
        Provides the ConsentAuthorisationApi with the opportunity to close this ConsentSession and redirect the PSU back to the TPP OR close the application window.

        In any case, the ConsentSession of the PSU will be terminated and cookies will be deleted.

        Parameters:
        DenyRedirectRequest - containing the exit page.
        consentAuthSessionCookie - The ConsentAuthSessionCookie
        Returns:
        Void

      • fromAspspOk

        @GetMapping(path="/from/aspsp/{consentSessionState}/ok")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> fromAspspOk(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                                String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                                @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                                String consentAuthSessionCookie)
        Redirecting back from ASPSP to ConsentAuthorisationApi after a successful consent authorization.
        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentAuthSessionCookie - The consent cookie
        Returns:
        Void

      • fromAspspNok

        @GetMapping(path="/from/aspsp/{consentSessionState}/nok")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> fromAspspNok(@PathVariable(value="consentSessionState")
                                                                                                                                  String consentSessionState,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                                                  String consentAuthSessionCookie)
        Redirecting back from ASPSP to TPP after a failed consent authorization.
        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentAuthSessionCookie - The consent cookie
        Returns:
        Void

      • embeddedAuth

        @PostMapping(path="/embedded/auth")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthorizeResponse> embeddedAuth(@RequestHeader(name="Cookie",required=false)
                                                                                                            String consentAuthSessionCookie,
                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                            PsuAuthRequest request)
        Update consent session with PSU auth data whereby requesting remaining challenges for the ongoing authorization process.
        Parameters:
        consentSessionState - The consent session state
        consentAuthSessionCookie - The consent cookie
        PsuAuthRequest - the PsuAuthRequest
        Returns:
        AuthorizeResponse
